name: KATANA - EPIC BATTLE
description:
The best arcade game Katana - Epic Battle takes arcade games to a new level, bringing back alive the legendary Sony ps1 game "Metal Slug" with higher resolution graphics, sound, and equipped with modern-day weapons. 

be the commando to battle your enemy forces throughout the intense levels and enjoy unlimited actions.

OFFLINE:

Enjoy The best arcade game Katana unlimited action-packed entertainment offline. 

NO INTERNET NO ISSUES.

Features:

- Great design and rugged graphics.

- Intuitive and flexible controls.

- Hours of captivating, mesmerizing, and addictive fun.

- Action-packed levels.

- Play to unlock legendary heroes.

- Modern-day military-grade weapons.

- Fight against armed enemy forces, gangs, and mercenaries.

- Hone your skills and experience to match whatever your enemies throw at you.

- Mesmerizing Gameplay.
